headlines.headline: The best- and worst-case trade scenarios for Giannis Antetokounmpo's fantasy value
headlines.description: With Giannis Antetokounmpo rumored to be in his final days with Milwaukee, Andre Snellings takes a look at the possible destinations and which would be best and worst for his fantasy value.

headlines.headline: How big of a statement was Cooper Flagg's 49-point game?
headlines.description: NBA senior writer Vincent Goodwill applauds Cooper Flagg's 49-point game after the rookie broke the NBA record for most points by a teenager.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Latest updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Catch up on the latest buzz, trade alerts and league intel from our ESPN NBA insiders.

headlines.headline: Do the Knicks need Giannis to win a ring?
headlines.description: Monica McNutt and Vincent Goodwill debate whether trading for Giannis Antetokounmpo would make the Knicks strong enough to win a championship.

headlines.headline: NBA trade deadline: How 8 East threats approach final-week sprint
headlines.description: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst examine eight East contenders, and how a Giannis trade could alter the conference hierarchy.

headlines.headline: Dallas faces Houston after Flagg's 49-point outing
headlines.description: Dallas Mavericks (19-29, 12th in the Western Conference) vs. Houston Rockets (29-17, fourth in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Why Stephen A. says Drake Maye has more to prove in Super Bowl LX
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith says Drake Maye has more pressure on him than Sam Darnold heading into the Super Bowl.

headlines.headline: Stephen A. calls on Bills president to improve Buffalo's roster
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith says new Bills president Brandon Beane needs to bolster the roster to give the Bills a chance at making the Super Bowl next season.

headlines.headline: Is Sean Mannion the correct choice as new Eagles OC?
headlines.description: Bart Scott and Harry Douglas discuss the Eagles hiring Sean Mannion as their new offensive coordinator.

headlines.headline: Is Josh Allen under more pressure than Joe Brady in Buffalo?
headlines.description: Bart Scott and Harry Douglas discuss expectations for Joe Brady as new Bills head coach.

headlines.headline: Why the NFL stood by Bad Bunny for the Super Bowl halftime show
headlines.description: The NFL has stood by its decision to book Bad Bunny for the Super Bowl halftime show, despite Trump administration criticism.

headlines.headline: Who has performed at Super Bowl halftime show? All-time list
headlines.description: Kendrick Lamar headlined the Super Bowl LIX halftime show in 2025. Check out every artist who has graced NFL's biggest stage now.

headlines.headline: Key matchups, stats for Avalanche-Red Wings, Rangers-Penguins
headlines.description: It's an NHL doubleheader Saturday on ABC and the ESPN app. Here's how to tune in, and what to watch.
